scripts.test:sepolia:smoke: env TEST_ENV='sepolia' mocha -r ts-node/register -r mocha-steps --grep '\[smoke\]' './test/**/**/*.test.ts' --timeout 240000 --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir='test-reports',reportFilename='[status]_[datetime]_sdk-test-report',timestamp='mm-dd-yyyy_HHMMss',reportTitle='SDK Test Report'
